backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a minimal backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a canister deployment fix feature with high confidence, referencing frontend/index.html and multiple components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing a romantic apology website for Maham with interactive name reveal, animated hearts, and blue flowers.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for borders, backgrounds, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application titled 'Maham Apology Website' with standard meta tags and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing an interactive apology reveal with clickable 'Maham' name, animated hearts, 30 randomly positioned blue flowers, and heartfelt apology message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file with no backend query implementations, as this is a frontend-only application.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with pink/red romantic gradient background, Playfair Display and Inter fonts, OKLCH color tokens, and custom animations for fade-in, reveal, and floating flower effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the App component with necessary provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color palette, Playfair Display serif font, custom glow shadow, and accordion animations using typography and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a canister deployment error (Error 400) that requires republishing to fix. Contains one existing feature focused on resolving the deployment issue and generating a valid working URL.
